com.bhaptics.ble.client

Class TactosyClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bhaptics.ble.client.BaseClient
      • com.bhaptics.ble.client.HapticPlayer

  • public class TactosyClient
extends BaseClient
    Detail implementation of BaseClient.

    There are scanning, reading and writing tactosies' characteristics.

      Interface definition for scanner callbacks.
